title: useValidTypeof
description: |
  This rule checks that the result of a `typeof\' expression is compared to a valid value.
---
import { Tabs, TabItem } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

**Diagnostic Category: `lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof`**
<Tabs>
<TabItem label="JavaScript (and super languages)" icon="seti:javascript">
**Since**: `v1.0.0`
:::note
- This rule is recommended by Biome. A diagnostic error will appear when linting your code.
- This rule has an **unsafe** fix.
:::

Sources: 
- Same as: <a href="https://eslint.org/docs/latest/rules/valid-typeof" target="_blank"><code>valid-typeof</code></a>

This rule checks that the result of a \`typeof' expression is compared to a valid value.

## Examples

### Invalid

```js
typeof foo === "strnig";
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:16 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/use-valid-typeof">lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">&quot;strnig&quot; is not a valid </span><span style="color: Tomato;"><strong>typeof</strong></span><span style="color: Tomato;"> value.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>typeof foo === &quot;strnig&quot;;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>               <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br /></code></pre>

```js
typeof foo == "undefimed";
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:15 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/use-valid-typeof">lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">&quot;undefimed&quot; is not a valid </span><span style="color: Tomato;"><strong>typeof</strong></span><span style="color: Tomato;"> value.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>typeof foo == &quot;undefimed&quot;;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>              <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br /></code></pre>

```js
typeof bar != "nunber";
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:15 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/use-valid-typeof">lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">&quot;nunber&quot; is not a valid </span><span style="color: Tomato;"><strong>typeof</strong></span><span style="color: Tomato;"> value.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>typeof bar != &quot;nunber&quot;;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>              <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br /></code></pre>

```js
typeof foo === undefined;
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:16 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/use-valid-typeof">lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">Invalid </span><span style="color: Tomato;"><strong>typeof</strong></span><span style="color: Tomato;"> comparison.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>typeof foo === undefined;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>               <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: lightgreen;">ℹ</span></strong> <span style="color: lightgreen;">Compare with one of the following string literals:</span><br />  <br />  - &quot;bigint&quot;<br />  - &quot;boolean&quot;<br />  - &quot;function&quot;<br />  - &quot;number&quot;<br />  - &quot;object&quot;<br />  - &quot;string&quot;<br />  - &quot;symbol&quot;<br />  - &quot;undefined&quot;<br />  <br /></code></pre>

```js
typeof foo == 0;
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:15 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/use-valid-typeof">lint/suspicious/useValidTypeof</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">Invalid </span><span style="color: Tomato;"><strong>typeof</strong></span><span style="color: Tomato;"> comparison.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>typeof foo == 0;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>              <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: lightgreen;">ℹ</span></strong> <span style="color: lightgreen;">Compare with one of the following string literals:</span><br />  <br />  - &quot;bigint&quot;<br />  - &quot;boolean&quot;<br />  - &quot;function&quot;<br />  - &quot;number&quot;<br />  - &quot;object&quot;<br />  - &quot;string&quot;<br />  - &quot;symbol&quot;<br />  - &quot;undefined&quot;<br />  <br /></code></pre>

### Valid

```js
typeof foo === "string";
```

```js
typeof bar == "undefined";
```

```js
typeof bar === typeof qux;
```

```js
typeof foo === bar
```
